class.name: VectorialCovariance

javadoc.text: Returns the covariance matrix of the available vectors.
Sums of products for each component.
Number of vectors in the sample.

javadoc.param: isBiasCorrected if true, computed the unbiased sample covariance, * otherwise computes the biased population covariance

javadoc.text: Add a new vector to the sample.
javadoc.throws: DimensionMismatchException if the vector does not have the right dimension

javadoc.text: Get the number of vectors in the sample.
javadoc.return: number of vectors in the sample

javadoc.text: Clears the internal state of the Statistic
